Description:
Our client is a Leading Automotive Company. They are now looking for a Customer Service Executive to join them.Roles & Responsibilities:To ensure the delivery process completion within the promised time to customers, through an extensive coordination with our partners
To handle inbound and outbound calls with our customers to ensure the highest quality assurance standards of our service are being met
To support our partners technically when required ensuring that all our technical solution in the shops work properly (tablets, speakers)
To provide the operations and business development teams with concise reports with regards to quality of orders highlighting areas of improvement
Hardworking, open to take other tasks assigned out of the responsibilities etcSalary: AED 5000 - AED 5500Skills
